body: If a refund is approved it will be paid to this account. We can only pay refunds to UK bank accounts.

components.html: We can't pay refunds into building society accounts that have a roll number

We encrypt this bank account information to keep it safe. Only specially authorised people can see bank details, which are only ever used to process a refund.

Find out more about [how we keep your information safe](https://claim-power-of-attorney-refund.service.gov.uk/terms#bank-details).
components.summary: How we keep bank details safe

components.html: You won't see these bank details again once you continue - we hide them for your security.
